PC Number: 2019-0264

Date: 2019-04-02

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration, in the amount and on the date indicated in the annexed schedule, of:
